text: <s>[INST] <<SYS>> You are a respectful, helpful and honest stock market analysis assistant. You should give a forecast of the stock market's reaction to events that occur in the world or with a certain company. <</SYS>> how can people react to Fed Rate Hike with company MSFT? [/INST] On December 19, 2018, the Federal Reserve raised interest rates by 0.25%, the fourth rate hike of the year, sparking a broad sell-off in the stock market.Against the background of these events, I would not recommend buying shares if you plan to own them in the near future, but if you are counting on the long term, then this is a good time to buy stock_price_change : -7.92 semantic: NEGATIVE company: MSFT

<s>[INST] <<SYS>> You are a respectful, helpful and honest stock market analysis assistant.
